    • ABOUT ME

    Hi there, I am Lilaphalapha

    My name is Bofihla Nneko commonly known
    as Lilaphalapha I am an actor, director and
    Comedian, as an actor and director I worked on
    comic called Lilaphalapha which has four parts.
    Also, I have appeared on South African soapie
    called The River as a guest actor. As a comedian,
    I perform in Lesotho and South African but
    I can perform anywhere around the world. I also
    work as master of ceremony this is also done in
    Lesotho, South Africa and anywhere around the
    world. Lastly, I work as a brand ambassador, where
    I work with companies like Econet Lesotho and Sechaba.
